description: This source file implements the container object functions for Http Mbo Chunked Object, including creation, removal, object enrollment, and initialization. It defines methods to manage chunked transfer encoding for HTTP payloads, including processing chunk data and trailers.

classes.name: HTTP_MBO_CHUNKED_OBJECT
classes.description: The main data structure representing the Http Mbo Chunked Object, encapsulating chunk transfer state, size parameters, function pointers, and chunk information list.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpMboChkCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new Http Mbo Chunked Object instance.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Http Mbo Chunked Object instance, freeing resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary sub-objects for the Http Mbo Chunked Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpMboChkInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Http Mbo Chunked Object, setting default values and function pointers.
